channel.title: Final Fight - XN [Drum n' Bass]
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/xn-extras/final_fight
First finished track with the "new Auxy" (i put that in quotes because i'm a free user so, its more of a downgrade really [spoiler]kek[/spoiler]) It was a challenge to get some good sounding drums, but i can get creative (pitched toms & claps ftw)
Idk how i made this really. I just thought of the drop bass line and was like "Yoooo i got an idea" and just kept working with it to eventually get here: https://soundcloud.com/xn-extras/final_fight
Also i was listening to some Obsidia and got some inspiration from there too.
enjoy. -XN -
